Notes: First tax bracket - lowest rate for income up to NZ$14,000
Second bracket - applies to income between NZ$14,001 and NZ$48,000
Third bracket - applies to income between NZ$48,001 and NZ$70,000
Fourth bracket - applies to income between NZ$70,001 and NZ$180,000. Most doctors fall in this bracket.
Top bracket - applies to income over NZ$180,000. Applicable to senior consultants and specialists.
Accident Compensation Corporation levy for workplace injury insurance. Rate applies to maximum liable earnings of NZ$152,790. Medical professionals typically at standard rate.

Optional retirement savings scheme - 3% minimum employee contribution (4%, 6%, 8%, 10% also available). Employer contributes matching 3% (not shown in tax deductions). Many doctors opt in for retirement savings.
